title: Panel For Turban, 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton, silk or rayon (?)
Technique: warp faced plain weave patterned by warp stripes and  extra-weft floats, inserted in shed A only, bound by every 14th or 16th foundation warp (MS'69)
creditline: Gift of Mrs Calvin W. Stillman
description: Seven narrow woven strips sewn together selvedge to selvedge. Light blue stripe on a tan background patterned with regularly-spaced green geometric motifs.

tombstone.epitaph:
